law.text:
The Department may not issue a low-level nuclear waste facility permit to a person unless:
The person meets the requirements of this subtitle for a low-level nuclear waste facility permit; and
The low-level nuclear waste facility permit conforms to any interstate low-level nuclear waste disposal compact of which this State is a member;
The Governor issues an executive order under § 7-234 of this subtitle; or
The Department determines under standards set by its rules or regulations that:
